title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Summer Park Hours  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Summer Park Hours   Buildings are open 8:00 am to 6:00 pm Central Time- Memorial Day through Labor Day.  Park trails are open 6:00 am to 10:00 pm Central Time.
